job.title: Data Engineer - PZT002
job.description:
LAAgencia is searching for a Data Engineer to work remotely. The candidate can be in Canada, the USA or Mexico just need to work on East Time (EST).

Location: Raritan NJ(Can work remote)

Requirements:
  • 5- 7+ years of professional experience with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent
  • Skills: C/C++/Java/GoLang/Python - Need any 2 of these skills.
  • AWS is highly recommended. Pharma/life science/clinical experience is an added advantage. Not Mandate.
